name: phosphor-icons
title: Phosphor Icons
description: Search, preview and copy Phosphor Icons
author: marinsokol

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Phosphor Icons
commands.description: Search, preview and copy Phosphor Icons

preferences.name: view
preferences.title: View
preferences.description: The view to display the icons in.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
